    Google scholar .

    Selected publications

    DYNAMITE: Dynamic Interplay of Mini-Batch Size and Aggregation Frequency for Federated Learning with Static and Streaming Datasets

    This paper investigates the interplay between the mini-batch size and number of local updates in federated learning.

    Weijie Liu, Xiaoxi Zhang, Jingpu Duan, Carlee Joe-Wong, Zhi Zhou and Xu Chen, IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing
    [Paper]

    TACO: Tackling Over-correction in Federated Learning with Tailored Adaptive Correction

    This paper provides the first investigation into the hidden over-correction phenomenon in federated learning.

    Weijie Liu, Ziwei Zhan, Carlee Joe-Wong, Edith Ngai, Jingpu Duan, Deke Guo, Xu Chen, and Xiaoxi Zhang, IEEE ICDCS 2025
    [Paper]

    AdaCoOpt: Leverage the interplay of batch size and aggregation frequency for federated learning

    Weijie Liu, Xiaoxi Zhang, Jingpu Duan, Carlee Joe-Wong, Zhi Zhou, and Xu Chen, IEEE IWQoS 2023 (Best Paper Candidate, top 7 in 264 submissions)
    [Paper]
